新古: (しんこ) - old and new (thing); old, but unused

新古品: (しんこひん) - new old stock; NOS; unused goods of old manufacture
新品同様: (しんぴんどうよう) - as good as new
新嘗祭: (しんじょうさい) - ceremonial offering by the Emperor of newly-harvested rice to the deities
新地: (しんち) - newly opened or newly developed territory
新型: (しんがた) - new type; new style; new model; new strain (e.g. infectious disease)

新型鬱病: (しんがたうつびょう) - new type depression; depression where one is depressed only when at work
新報: (しんぽう) - (often used in newspaper and magazine names) news
新境地: (しんきょうち) - new ground (science, art, etc.); new front; new scope; frontier

新大関: (しんおおぜき) - {sumo} wrestler newly promoted to ozeki rank
新天地: (しんてんち) - new land; new world; new sphere of activity
新妓: (しんこ) - (新子 only)  very young fish (esp. a konoshiro gizzard shad); new geisha
新婚生活: (しんこんせいかつ) - newly-married life
新子: (しんこ) - (新子 only)  very young fish (esp. a konoshiro gizzard shad); new geisha

新宗教: (しんしゅうきょう) - new religion

新局面: (しんきょくめん) - new phase; new aspect; new stage

新巻: (あらまき) - salted salmon; fish wrapped in (bamboo) leaves

新年会: (しんねんかい) - New Year's party

新快速: (しんかいそく) - limited express (train, faster than an express)

新所帯: (しんしょたい) - new household; new home
